data.message: I hate it, i am sick of seeing things from yesterday above things that people post 5 mins ago. and enough with the advertisements already!

replies.message: Thenks man

I go on FB every morning and there are posts from 18 hours ago (that I already read) 18 hours before....sometimes a person will post seconds ago and I will get posts hours before THEN the person who recently posted comes up.......
Exactly what I was thinking! I want to see CURRENT statuses or daily statuses. Not statuses from yesterday or the day before..
You guys do realize you can change that right? You can choose top stories or most recent on your news feed. your complaining about something they already give you an option for...
I do that every day sarah and it still does the same thing, showing post from yesterday before ones recently posted
free service deal with the ads and change.  again - free service
False advertisements, spam ...

"Facebook: where you are not the customer; you are the product."  Think of how I feel as a regular advertiser and consultant for small business... every time Facebook makes a change, less and less of what I post on pages actually reaches the folks who "like" the business... and Facebook insists that I PAY them for additional reach.  Increasingly.  I just read today that the next change (already in the works) will result in only about 1-2% of my "fanbase" being "reached" organically.  And that's the number of people on whose feed a post appears at all, not the number of people who actually interact with it.  Facebook advertising used to be a better deal than a lot of the other options... that is rapidly becoming no longer true.
it's horrible ... change it back
I'd like to see it back to when it was in chronological order...it's very confusing!
I can actually read it now!!! Yipppee!
Look at that column on the left, at the top where it says "Newsfeed" Click on the little triangle arrow and you can choose "Most recent" or "Top Stories"
I agree. If someone wants to read MORE about yesterdays post they should look it up. Not FB bumping it back to the top.
cry me a river
adblock plus. no ads.
You have to change your setting to "most recent" but the new layout still sucks!

My settings, I always & constantly change to 'most recent' as I'm well aware of how to navigate on here. What many are complaining about and fortunately some of you are blessed not to be experiencing is setting to 'most recent' EVERY time you use FB and posts are still mixed up oddly - for example: the top of your feed displaying 18hrs ago, the following post displaying 1minute ago, the post after that displaying 6hrs ago, the next displaying 4seconds ago, and so on and so forth... get it? And, why you see many asking for 'chronological order' b/c when selecting 'most recent' it should be just that MOST RECENT in chronological order. Geesh...😒 FaceBook just wants to be the next MySpace, that's all😏 (yes, sarcasm that was...eyes rolling😏).
If you have an IPHONE as I do, the option (ya know the one I had to change every time I went on facebook with mobile) for top stories and most recent was removed.
YA
I agree with older posting coming up before new one.  It is very hard to keep track and miss a lot of them that I would have like to read.
:D
